column4: i went to gogoel video and watch movie of guitar but the thing will play(the flash movie) but there is no sound, other apps got sound.  I am using kde.
holy cow that was horrible grammar
In firefox, on kubuntu, I get flash movies to play, but ther is no sound.  Sound works fine on the system, other apps have sound.  How can I start troubleshooting
some things only allow one program to run sound at a time, is there another program that might be playing sound now?
